response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the oyster without any errors. Now, the robot needs to grasp the oyster.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the oyster
(2) Grasp the oyster
(3) Move to the stove
(4) Put the oyster on the stove
(5) Cook the oyster
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Grasp the oyster
    oyster = registry(env,"oyster_201")
    EasyGrasp(robot, oyster)
    donothing(env)
